title: Zimmer mit Stall
overview: In the amusing television comedy Zimmer mit Stall, Aglaia Szyszkowitz and Friedrich von Thun face each other as the main actor duo: She plays the newly hired landlady of a mountain inn, who wrestles with him as a stubborn neighbor. In order to realize her life idea of a completely new start in the country, the lively city dweller has to pull herself together with the typical Bavarian curmudgeon of all people. Ingo Rasper directed the entertaining film. The natural scenery of Upper Bavaria with lush meadows and an imposing mountain panorama makes you want to spend a holiday in the country.
